description: Displays the low-level information and configuration of a Docker or Podman container with the specified container ID or name

name.description: Docker or Podman container ID or name to display the information

name: container_inspect

description: Prints out information about the running Docker or Podman containers
name: container_list

description: Displays the logs of a Docker or Podman container with the specified container ID or name

name.description: Docker or Podman container ID or name to display the logs

name: container_logs

description: Removes a Docker or Podman container with the specified container ID or name (rm)

name.description: Docker or Podman container ID or name to remove

name: container_remove

description: Runs a Docker or Podman container with the specified image name

environment.description: Environment variables to set in the container. Format: <key>=<value>. Example: FOO=bar. (Optional, add only to set environment variables)

imageName.description: Docker or Podman container image name to run

ports.description: Port mappings to expose on the host. Format: <hostPort>:<containerPort>. Example: 8080:80. (Optional, add only to expose ports)

name: container_run

description: Stops a Docker or Podman running container with the specified container ID or name

name.description: Docker or Podman container ID or name to stop

name: container_stop

description: Build a Docker or Podman image from a Dockerfile, Podmanfile, or Containerfile

containerFile.description: The absolute path to the Dockerfile, Podmanfile, or Containerfile to build the image from

imageName.description: Specifies the name which is assigned to the resulting image if the build process completes successfully (--tag, -t)

name: image_build

description: List the Docker or Podman images on the local machine
name: image_list

description: Copies (pulls) a Docker or Podman container image from a registry onto the local machine storage

imageName.description: Docker or Podman container image name to pull

name: image_pull

description: Pushes a Docker or Podman container image, manifest list or image index from local machine storage to a registry

imageName.description: Docker or Podman container image name to push

name: image_push

description: Removes a Docker or Podman image from the local machine storage

imageName.description: Docker or Podman container image name to remove

name: image_remove

description: List all the available Docker or Podman networks
name: network_list

description: List all the available Docker or Podman volumes
name: volume_list
